Package com.twl.xg.dao

Class BorderRouterRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twl.xg.dao.BorderRouterRepository

  • @Repository
public class BorderRouterRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    persistence layer class for BorderRouterEntity. Defines basic database operation methods for border router entity.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Xiaozheng Guo
    See Also:
    BorderRouterEntity

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public java.lang.String save​(BorderRouterEntity borderRouterEntity)
        Save the input border router in database; Throws NullPointerException if the input borderRouterEntity is null;
        Parameters:
        borderRouterEntity - The model of border router you want to save.
        Returns:
        Return the ID of border router entity, in this case, the ID is its IPv6 address.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<BorderRouterEntity> getAll​()
        Fetch all border router from database, ordered by border router name.
        Returns:
        A list of BorderRouterEntity.

      • size

        public long size​()
        Get the number of borderRouter entries in database.
        Returns:
        The number of entries in database.

      • clear

        public void clear​()
        Delete all entries in borderRouter table. Note: This method will also delete all entries in sensor table and sensorData table, because these two tables are delete-cascade.

      • get

        public BorderRouterEntity get​(java.lang.String borderRouterIp)
        Get a BorderRouterEntity instance for the input border router IP. Return null if the input border router IP doesn't exist in database.
        Parameters:
        borderRouterIp - The IPv6 address of the border router you want to get.
        Returns:
        BorderRouterEntity
